name: The Depths (itch) (Grey Magic)
description:
You are diving the infinite ocean, hoping one day you'll find treasure.

Instructions:

Click/Hold left mouse button to move

Attack creatures by clicking left mouse button anywhere when stamina bar is full

Charge stamina bar by not moving/releasing left mouse button

R to Restart

Left numbers shows depth, Right numbers show kill multiplier and highest kill mulitplier

Gameplay, Audio and Art made by Grey Magic.

Let me know your high scores.
